category.name: BOM Markup Space
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: EDITCONTEXT_query_to_execute
preference.preference_description: Defines the name of the saved query to be used for Edit context objects. The default value is "Edit Context..." If modified, the new query must have at least one attribute named 'userID' as criteria. For more information, follow the 'Edit Context...' query.
